name: Space Runner (NeXzXBlitZ)
description:
This is an infinite runner developed for the Oculus Quest.

Find yourself thrown into an infinite running platformer, with the use of your grappling gun and array of weapons, destroy any obstacle in your path.

Earn points by moving and destroying platforms, encouraging a high risk high reward playstyle. Brag to your friends with your highscores.

This is a work in progress, feedback is welcome!
